content: I'm currently searching for the source of StructureDefinitions of the FHIR Data Types. I'm aware of the definitions.xml - but there the individual DataTypes are split up in it's DataElements. Is there a source on the FHIR HP which i haven't found/overseen?
but profiles-types.xml is just the ones you are looking for
thanks, i totally missed that and was focused on the dataelements.xml.
